java/liquibase/change/custom/CustomChangeWrapper.java

00001 package liquibase.change.custom;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.change.AbstractChange;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.exception.CustomChangeException;
00008 import liquibase.exception.RollbackImpossibleException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00011 import liquibase.util.ObjectUtil;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.*;
00016 
00024 public class CustomChangeWrapper extends AbstractChange {
00025 
00026     private CustomChange customChange;
00027     private String className;
00028     private SortedSet<String> params = new TreeSet<String>();
00029     private Map<String, String> paramValues = new HashMap<String, String>();
00030     private ClassLoader classLoader;
00031 
00032     public CustomChangeWrapper() {
00033         super("customChange", "Custom Change");
00034     }
00035 
00036     public CustomChange getCustomChange() {
00037         return customChange;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public ClassLoader getClassLoader() {
00041         return classLoader;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader) {
00045         this.classLoader = classLoader;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setClass(String className) throws CustomChangeException {
00049         this.className = className;
00050         try {
00051 //            System.out.println(classLoader.toString());
00052             try {
00053                 customChange = (CustomChange) Class.forName(className, true, classLoader).newInstance();
00054             } catch (ClassCastException e) { //fails in Ant in particular
00055                 customChange = (CustomChange) Class.forName(className).newInstance();
00056             }
00057         } catch (Exception e) {
00058             throw new CustomChangeException(e);
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00062     public void setParam(String name, String value) {
00063         this.params.add(name);
00064         this.paramValues.put(name, value);
00065     }
00066 
00067 
00068     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00069         customChange.validate(database);
00070     }
00071 
00072     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00073         SqlStatement[] statements = null;
00074         try {
00075             configureCustomChange();
00076             if (customChange instanceof CustomSqlChange) {
00077                 statements = ((CustomSqlChange) customChange).generateStatements(database);
00078             } else if (customChange instanceof CustomTaskChange) {
00079                 ((CustomTaskChange) customChange).execute(database);
00080             } else {
00081                 throw new UnsupportedChangeException(customChange.getClass().getName() + " does not implement " + CustomSqlChange.class.getName() + " or " + CustomTaskChange.class.getName());
00082             }
00083         } catch (CustomChangeException e) {
00084             throw new UnsupportedChangeException(e);
00085         }
00086 
00087         if (statements == null) {
00088             statements = new SqlStatement[0];
00089         }
00090         return statements;
00091     }
00092 
00093     public SqlStatement[] generateRollbackStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException, RollbackImpossibleException {
00094         SqlStatement[] statements = null;
00095         try {
00096             configureCustomChange();
00097             if (customChange instanceof CustomSqlRollback) {
00098                 statements = ((CustomSqlRollback) customChange).generateRollbackStatements(database);
00099             } else if (customChange instanceof CustomTaskRollback) {
00100                 ((CustomTaskRollback) customChange).rollback(database);
00101             } else {
00102                 throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Unknown rollback type: "+customChange.getClass().getName());
00103             }
00104         } catch (CustomChangeException e) {
00105             throw new UnsupportedChangeException(e);
00106         }
00107 
00108         if (statements == null) {
00109             statements = new SqlStatement[0];
00110         }
00111         return statements;
00112 
00113     }
00114 
00115 
00116     public boolean canRollBack() {
00117         return customChange instanceof CustomSqlRollback || customChange instanceof CustomTaskRollback;
00118     }
00119 
00120     private void configureCustomChange() throws CustomChangeException {
00121         try {
00122             for (String param : params) {
00123                 ObjectUtil.setProperty(customChange, param, paramValues.get(param));
00124             }
00125             customChange.setFileOpener(getFileOpener());
00126             customChange.setUp();
00127         } catch (Exception e) {
00128             throw new CustomChangeException(e);
00129         }
00130     }
00131 
00132     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00133         return customChange.getConfirmationMessage();
00134     }
00135 
00136     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00137         Element customElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("custom");
00138         customElement.setAttribute("class", className);
00139 
00140         for (String param : params) {
00141             Element paramElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("param");
00142             paramElement.setAttribute("name", param);
00143             paramElement.setAttribute("value", paramValues.get(param));
00144 
00145             customElement.appendChild(paramElement);
00146         }
00147 
00148         return customElement;
00149     }
00150 
00151     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00152         return null;
00153     }
00154 }
